summary: Peter Mark Andrew Phillips  is the only son of Anne, Princess Royal, and her first husband, Captain Mark Phillips.
full_text: Captain Mark Anthony Peter Phillips CVO ADC  is an English Olympic gold-medal-winning horseman for Great Britain and ex-husband of Anne, Princess Royal, with whom he had two children. He remains a leading figure in British equestrian circles, a noted eventing course designer, and a columnist in Horse & Hound magazine.
title: Mark Phillips
